definition: to seek/to strive for/to obtain/see also 牟取[mou2 qu3]
to seek one's livelihood/to work to support oneself/to earn a living
premeditated/to plan sth in advance (esp. a crime)
to agree without prior consultation/to happen to hold the same view
to put forward plans and ideas (also derogatory)/to give advice (idiom)

sentences.english: He desired to obtain a position in the Civil Service.
sentences.chinese: 他想望在政府行政機關裏謀到一個職位。

sentences.english: He jobbed his son into the position.
sentences.chinese: 他用舞弊手段爲兒子謀得這個職位。

sentences.english: She bluffed her way into the job.
sentences.chinese: 她以欺騙手段謀得工作。

sentences.english: Help us to share, to serve, and to seek the common good of all.
sentences.chinese: 幫助我們去分享，去服務，去爲所有人謀幸福。

sentences.english: Jiashen spring plans to seek a harmonious Chinese New Chapter.
sentences.chinese: 甲申春日謀大計，和諧中國譜新篇。

sentences.english: But I didn’t do this to get more donations.
sentences.chinese: 但是我不會爲此去謀得更多的捐贈。

sentences.english: Therefore, we must seek the correct way to strive for peace.
sentences.chinese: 要尋求“謀和”的正確道路。

sentences.english: The concept of promoting development and security through cooperation has taken a deeper root in the hearts of all.
sentences.chinese: 以合作促發展，以合作謀安全的理念更加深入人心。

sentences.english: He got a position in the bank.
sentences.chinese: 他在銀行謀得一個職位。

sentences.english: And Hushai said unto Absalom, The counsel that Ahithophel hath given is not good at this time.
sentences.chinese: 戶篩對押沙龍說，亞希多弗這次所定的謀不善。

definition: old variant of 愷|恺[kai3]/old variant of 凱|凯[kai3]
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji
to select/to choose/to pick over/to pick out/to differentiate/to eliminate/also pr. [zhai2]
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
